response.overview: Join Bob the Tomato, Larry the Cucumber and the rest of the Veggie Tales crew for this all-new collection of Christmas sing-along songs that the whole family is sure to enjoy!  Track Listing:  Hope It's Gonna Be A Happy Christmas from Saint Nicholas - A Story of Joyful Giving  I Can't Believe It's Christmas from The Toy That Saved Christmas  While By My Sheep from A Veggie Tales Christmas Spectacular  Oh Santa from The Toy That Saved Christmas  Ring Little Bells from A Veggie Tales Christmas Spectacular  Donuts for Benny from Saint Nicholas - A Story of Joyful Giving  Fa-La-La from Saint Nicholas - A Story of Joyful Giving  Grumpy Kids from The Toy That Saved Christmas  Nicholas, Nicholas - Medley from Saint Nicholas - A Story of Joyful Giving  I Can Love - Medley from Saint Nicholas - A Story of Joyful Giving
response.title: VeggieTales: Christmas Sing-Along Songs
